caption:
It's always Umbra season, but as the days get brighter, staying on top of your sunscreen game matters even more. 

☀️HOT TIPS☀️
Reapply every 2-3 hours when you're at the beach or in direct sunlight. 

Use a sunscreen with antioxidants—like Umbra—to protect skin from blue-light radiation.

Try a mineral sunscreen—like Umbra!—to avoid potentially sensitizing ingredients found in chemical sunscreens.
